videos.title: 2025 Sea Otter Classic Fuego XL
videos.description:
2025 Sea Otter Classic Fuego XL
Since the early '90's I've known of the Sea Otter Classic MTB event in Monterey, California... and last year decided it was time to check it out for myself.
Here is my "Fuego XL" full run (basically all the footage I recorded) It is a tough event, tougher than I expected. While we had great weather - not too hot, sunny - a bit of wind which you really felt in your face as the day progressed, but the climbs are long.
This video is to hopefully show as much of the course as possible so if you're considering entering (and I suggest you do!) hopefully this gives you a good idea of the terrain and event overall!
Hopefully I'll have a shortened version done shortly!

If you get the chance - go! It was a great event, great people, (invited to "somewhere" every evening by "bikers" MTB, Gravel and Gravity - everyone there for a great time)
I got to meet / watch world bike celebs and just have a great time throughout!

If you wish to help support this channel please visit:  patreon.com/AdventureAL55
I plan to enter at least 1 major event each year, as well as take on the local MTB and Cross races.
2025 Goal (Here it is) Sea Otter Classic - Enduro and Fuego XL (Laguna Raceway, California) - DONE
Next... Volcanic MTB, New Zealand. Trans Rockies Singletrack 6, BC, Canada

videos.title: 2023 Sea Otter Fuego XL Race Recap
videos.description:
Here I take you through my experience and thoughts during the Fuego XL at the 2023 Sea Otter Classic, the first round of the lifetime gp series. 

These videos take a lot of  time to make and sometimes the adventures are expensive. If you feel like donating to encourage/help me offset costs, THANKYOU! Your contribution is greatly appreciated and gives me the resources to provide y'all more content. 
Venmo: www.venmo.com/u/Kerry-Werner-1
paypal: https://www.paypal.com/paypalme/kerrywerner

https://bike.shimano.com/en-US/home.html
https://www.konaworld.com
https://www.maxxis.com/tires/bicycle

hey guys Carrie Werner checking in after

so sea otter classic is a big vendor

kicked off first thing on Saturday

road there wasn't a lot of technical

less for me

having a good start and kind of settling

right at right in that like 15th spot or
so and then kind of tried to do my best
to work up early and I knew once we
crested that first major climb it was

where groups were going to come together
apart I found myself in a good group of
like five or six guys by about halfway

Lachlan Morton Alex Howells and Lance
hadette we ended up catching up to

through the start finish with us we were
kind of cruising there from about
halfway through the lap until I mean all
the way through the
the start finish starting lap two
like I said the pace was hot we could
see the chase group kind of up the road
just like maybe a minute up I think it
was 30 seconds at that halfway Aid and
by the time we came across the line
heading into the second lap it was
roughly a minute as we entered that
second lap we grabbed a bottle there
right on the Raceway and then kind of
got ready for those first Punchy climbs
again and right there is where our group
split up uh right on that first bit of
single track so it was Braden Kyle
Trudeau and myself kind of going over

could smell blood in the water as guys

first of which was Tobin uh we ended up
catching him right there after the

and then it was it was Kyle Tobin Braden
and I

where we lost contact with the rest of
the dudes by the time we came through

and then it was Braden Tobin and me and
this was in this in this the race for

into that kind of last like 45 minutes

was really nervous about this because
coming into that last bit of the race I

time trial from that point to the end
where I was constantly looking back I

don't have any footage of this I was
in a fight for my life it felt like out
there
the last thing I was thinking about in

was just lack of energy and focus I was

um yeah all those guys that maybe were

track or you know aren't as good

so that was my race uh thanks for
watching the race recap
um leave any questions or comments below
and I'll see you guys at the next one
which will be lifetime Grand Prix round
two Unbound gravel

videos.title: Sea Otter Classic Fuego XC 2024 | Full Course | Men 30-39
videos.description:
This is the full course of the 2024 Sea Otter Classic Fuego XC in Monterey, California. This was my first XC race ever and my second bike race (I raced the enduro two days before). It was a quite the humbling experience. Bicycle people are crazy.

Place: 31/48 (Men 30-39)
417/775 Overall
Distance: 21.0 miles
Time: 2:05:44

CHAPTERS:

00:00:00 : Start 
00:03:13 : Couch Canyon
00:31:14 : Fire Road to Boy Scout
00:35:14 : Outhouse 
00:36:16 : Kids on the Trail
00:40:06 : Gravel Road to Goat Trail
00:51:26 : Goat Trail (Backwards)
01:03:56 : Fire Road (Three Sisters?)
01:08:32 : Red Rock
01:13:00 : Watering Station
01:17:28 : Trail 49 Climb
01:25:12 : Trail 49 Down
01:30:28 : Trail 50 Climb
01:39:56 : Lookout Ridge Rd Climb
01:59:22 : Laguna Seca Downhill
02:02:18 : Spring to the Finish!

*I kept calling trail 44 boyscout. It’s actually outhouse.

videos.title: Life Time Sea Otter Classic presented by Continental | 2024 RACE HIGHLIGHTS
videos.description:
Watch the full extended highlights from 2024’s Sea Otter Classic presented by Continental Fuego XL – stop #1 of the Life Time Grand Prix presented by Mazda. Athletes took on 100K of punchy climbs, rutted fire roads, and flowy singletrack to kick off the season. Up next? The LTGP heads to the infamous Flint Hills of Kansas for Life Time UNBOUND Gravel!

Be sure to Subscribe @LifeTimeGrandPrix  Don't miss the action!

#SOC  #FuegoXL #LifeTimeGrandPrix #LTGP #MTB #Cycling #MTBRace #seaotterclassic 

Learn more about the Life Time Grand Prix: https://www.lifetimegrandprix.com

LTGP Athlete bios and more: https://www.lifetimegrandprix.com/athlete/ 

Don't forget to build your Fantasy Team: https://www.fantasizr.com/sport/fantasy-lifetime-grand-prix

Learn more about the Sea Otter Classic: https://www.seaotterclassic.com/

🎥 Cold Collaborative: https://www.coldcollab.com/
